name: PPinger
author: http://cleverplugins.com

sections.description:
PPinger helps you use your visitors to ping Pingomatic.com that your blog has been updated.

It randomizes between pinging a randomly selected amount of these RSS aggregators:

Weblogs.com
Blo.gs
Technorati
FeedBurner
Syndic8
NewsGator
MyYahoo!
PubSub.com
Blogdigger
BlogStreet
Moreover
Weblogalot
Icerocket
NewsIsFree
TopicExchange
GoogleBlogSearch
Spinn3r
Bloglines
PostRank
SkyGrid
Collecta
Superfeedr

It is a good help for getting new blogs indexed.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin via your WordPress installation
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this improve my SEO?

Yes and no. It helps you ping your freshly created website, in fact it uses your visitors to increase exposure.
sections.changelog:
3.1

  • Code fixes based on feedback from nekstrebor in support forum. Thank you ðŸ™‚
  • Added last message note – suggest from nekstrebor in support forum.
  • Removed interval option – runs automatically twice a day.
  • Code cleanup – Lots of old and unecessary code removed

3.0

  • Rewrite entire plugin
  • WordPress 3.6 compatible

2.3

  • WordPress 3.0 Compatible
  • Backlinks can be turned on and off in settings.
  • Ad service location updated.
  • Dashboard Widget can now be turned on and off in the settings page
  • Updated help/info page inside plugin.

short_description: Pings your blog to Pingomatic using your visitors's IP's at random intervals.
